name: activity_mark-thread-as-read
description: Marks a thread as "read." Marking a thread as "read" is equivalent to clicking a notification in your notification inbox on GitHub Enterprise Server: https://github.com/notifications.

thread_id.description: The unique identifier of the notification thread. This corresponds to the value returned in the `id` field when you retrieve notifications (for example with the [`GET /notifications` operation](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.3/rest/reference/activity#list-notifications-for-the-authenticated-user)).
